title: Bug 116829 - Label height not changing with label font modification
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the UI where the label is displayed.
2. Modify the font size of the label.

OB: The label height does not change after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: The label height should adjust dynamically when the font size is modified.
SR: 1. Open the UI where the label is displayed. 2. Modify the font size of the label and observe that the label height does not change.
